value.stringValue: Customer has requested that this case be escalated with the reason: {!ReasonEscalated}

fields.name: Thanks
fields.fieldText:
Thank you {!UserFirstName}.
Your Request "{!PressNEXT}" for Case Number {!CaseSOV.CaseNumber} is Confirmed.
It would be very helpful to us if you could take the time to provide a reason for closing this
